What is the name of the end-to-end speech-to-speech translation system mentioned in the text, and how does it preserve speaker characteristics during the translation process?
What is the name of the end-to-end speech-to-speech translation system mentioned in the text, and how does it preserve speaker characteristics?

The key components of the Translator-Tran system that allow it to preserve speaker characteristics include spectrogram conversion, concatenation of phoneme representation with speaker information, and the use of a second decoder to generate target spectrograms.
